name: Super LOH
description:
Plunge into an incredible atmosphere of Super LoH (Layers of Horror) !
Explore fascinating levels full of various monsters and and make enough money so you can buy gorgeous hat!

And don't forget to save a beautiful lady! Or to buy one. You don't want to kill all the monsters alone, do you?

Features:
  • The boar
  • +100 levels and more with every update!
  • More than 20 types of monsters ready to kill you cruelly.
  • Unique magic sticks available in the shop.
  • Gorgeous hats!
  • Amazing soundtrack by Classican
  • Cards and achievements!

The game will help you have fun while spending spare time you don't have
P.S. we have some badges for you
